name: Bunny Birthday
description:
It's your birthday! Time to wake up and grab breakfast, chat with everybunny, and have a good day.

---

HOW TO PLAY

SPACE - Talk / Eat
WASD/ARROW KEYS - Move
R - Restart Level

---

Bunny Birthday is a short birthday present for my friend developed in DungeonScript, a 3D engine based off of PuzzleScript. Just a simple and fun game to cheer you up!

Music is Blue Skies from YouTube's Audio Library.
